mapper.insert: insert into Customer (c_name, c_phoneNo, c_age, c_point, c_level, c_gender, storeCode ) values (#{c_name},#{c_phoneNo},#{c_age},#{c_point}, #{c_level}, #{c_gender},#{storeCode})
mapper.select: SELECT customerNo, c_name, c_phoneNo, c_gender, c_age, c_point, c_level FROM customer WHERE storeCode = #{id} AND customerNo > 0
